mapper.insert: insert into tb_article(author, title, tags, category, content, publish_time) values(#{author, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tags, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{publishTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select article_id, title, author, category, thumb, tags, publish_time from tb_article
select article_id, title, author, category, thumb, tags, publish_time from tb_article where title like "%"#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
